message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can work from there if you'd like.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Take it or leave it - the clock is ticking and the pot is shrinking.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 80/20. I still think my initial offer was fair, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
Alice, we're running out of time.  My last offer is on the table: 55/45.  It's a reasonable split that benefits us both before inflation eats away at the value any further.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to come down to 70/30.  We're both losing money with each round, and I'm not sure how much longer we can keep this up.
